allow: Bash(gh auth login --hostname github.com --git-protocol https --web 2>&1 | head -5)
Bash(echo "vkiet432" | sudo -S apt-get install -y poppler-utils 2>&1 | tail -5)

Bash(echo "vkiet432" | sudo -S apt-get install -y python3-pil 2>&1 | tail -3 && python3 -c "from PIL import Image; Image.open\('/tmp/hsk5_page-01.ppm'\).save\('/tmp/hsk5_page-01.jpg'\); print\('ok'\)")

Bash(which python3 && python3 --version 2>&1; which tesseract && tesseract --version 2>&1 | head -3; pip3 show pytesseract 2>&1 | head -3; pip3 show pdf2image 2>&1 | head -3; pip3 show deep-translator 2>&1 | head -3)
Bash(which tesseract 2>&1; tesseract --version 2>&1 | head -3; tesseract --list-langs 2>&1 | head -10)
Bash(echo "vkiet432" | sudo -S apt-get install -y tesseract-ocr tesseract-ocr-chi-sim 2>&1 | tail -5)
Bash(echo "vkiet432" | sudo -S apt-get install -y tesseract-ocr-chi-sim 2>&1 | tail -3 && pip3 install pytesseract pdf2image deep-translator pillow 2>&1 | tail -5)
Bash(echo "vkiet432" | sudo -S apt-get install -y python3-pip 2>&1 | tail -3 && python3 -m pip install pytesseract pdf2image deep-translator 2>&1 | tail -8)
